vsParam:
Sorry to come to you unnoticed.
I'd like to ask you for another favor.

Ho ho, I knew that you'd come.
It's about Scalcap, right?

Yes. I want to make a cuisine approved by father,
so I hope that you can make me the best materials.

That's easy, but why must you use alchemy?
Can't normal materials do it?

Yes, they can. But I've been thinking about why
father wouldn't approve of my cuisines last time.

I think it might because I didn't look for
your help at critical moments.

Yeah. If I asked for your help, I might be able
to make better cuisines, but I didn't.

So I've decided to lay down my face this time.
I must make the best cuisine and win father's approval!

To do that... [px]!
Please help me!
I am looking forward to your best cuisine.

Hee hee, thank you.
I knew you'd say yes.

Hey, don't be so impatient.
However, I am relaxed now seeing that you're so confident.

Thank you, [px]!
Let's work together and make the best cuisine!
